focus_words.discussion: Explores the root בראש with Resh-head and Aleph-strength themes.
Considers Aleph-strength and plural structure in a Paleo frame.
Looks at the consonants in Israel and how struggle and ruling imagery appear in Paleo symbols.
Reviews the verb of being with Aleph and Hey as revelation of existence.
Tav-mark and Resh-head combine to show guidance marked out for the covenant people.
Beit-house and Tav-mark express a marked relationship that binds households.
